name: Tome of the Master Scribe
data: It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It has little armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'remove invulnerabilities'.
Good grip allows you to slam somebody with tome.
'...do not open it.....' echoes through your mind.
